comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called ANYTHING GOES ENGLAND,VINTAGE PHOTOS,POSTCARDS,EPHEMERAetc..., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 8543109@N02
comment._content: This bridge is now located in Lake Havasu City, Arizona.

comment.author: 8110957@N08
comment._content: It is indeed.....see this link for a first day cover celebrating that fact. www.flickr.com/photos/mando_gal/2356148998/

comment.author: 38103019@N03
comment._content: Wow, I saw the bridge in Lake Havasu City when I was a child and thought it was so beautiful. I never realized it was reconstructed from the actual London Bridge designed by John Rennie. That is awesome.

comment.author: 84989850@N00
comment._content: More information can be seen here about the transportation of the bridge to America and how a veneer of the stone was taken to cover the new bridge. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London_Bridge_(Lake_Havasu_City)

comment.author: 64203474@N02
comment._content: Cross this bridge most days - wonderful to see how it was a century or so ago. Beauty of London is that things stay the same, yet change. The cars and people are different but some of those building surrounding the bridge still stand, undisturbed and fully utilised
